name: Neither Rain nor Snow
text:
Stella Clark deck only.
If this skill test fails, cancel all effects of the failed test.

name: .18 Derringer
text: Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer.

name: Grimm's Fairy Tales
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[reaction] After an investigator at your location fails a skill test by 2 or more, exhaust Grimm's Fairy Tales and spend 1 secret: Heal 1 horror from that investigator.

name: Old Keyring
text: Uses (2 keys). If there are no keys on Old Keyring, discard it. [action]: Investigate. Your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, remove 1 key from Old Keyring.

name: Granny Orne
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator fails by either 1 less or 1 more.

name: Mysterious Raven
text: [fast] Discard Mysterious Raven and take 1 horror: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Rabbit's Foot
text: [reaction] After you fail a skill test, exhaust Rabbit's Foot: Draw 1 card.

name: Scrapper
text:
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [combat] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: Will to Survive
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test you perform this turn.

name: A Test of Will
text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, cancel that card's revelation effect.

name: Dumb Luck
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on top of the encounter deck.

name: Grit Your Teeth
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test.
You get +1 to each of your skills for the remainder of the round.

name: Live and Learn
text: Fast. Play after a skill test you failed ends (after resolving all effects from the failed test). Attempt that test again. You get +2 skill value for this test.

name: "Look what I found!"
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 clues in your location.

name: Oops!
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you.
Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.

name: Take Heart
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Take Heart to any type of test.
If this test fails, the performing investigator draws 2 cards and gains 2 resources.

name: Cherished Keepsake
text: Forced - When Cherished Keepsake is defeated by horror: Exile it.

name: Leather Coat
text: Forced - When Leather Coat is defeated by damage: Exile it.

name: .18 Derringer
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, place 1 ammo on .18 Derringer and the next time you trigger this ability this round, you get an additional +1 [combat] for that attack.

name: A Test of Will
text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, test [willpower] (3). If you fail, exile A Test of Will.

name: "Look what I found!"
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less while investigating.
Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: Dumb Luck
text:
Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-[[Elite]] enemy.
Place that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck.

name: Unexpected Courage
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test fails, return Unexpected Courage to your hand.

name: Granny Orne
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] When an investigator at your location would fail a skill test, exhaust Granny Orne: That investigator either gets +1 skill value or -1 skill value for that test.

name: Lucky!
text:
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test.
They get +3 to their skill value for that test. That investigator draws 1 card.

name: Chainsaw
text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack fails, either place 1 supply on Chainsaw or deal 1 damage to the attacked enemy.

name: Quick Learner
text:
Permanent.
During or before your first action of each of your turns, each skill test you perform gets +1 difficulty.
During or after your third action of each of your turns, each skill test you performed gets -1 difficulty.

name: Déjà Vu
text:
Permanent.
In between two scenarios of a campaign, reduce the experience cost to repurchase up to 3 cards that you exiled during the last scenario by 1 each.
